VFTParams¶

class VFTParams.VFTParams(pattern, strategy, stimulus, background)¶

Bases: object

Parameters of a VFT in the report

pattern¶

The testing algorithm.

stimulus¶

The stimulus used for the test.

background¶

The background light used for the test.

strategy¶

The testing strategy being used.

__init__(pattern, strategy, stimulus, background)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.
